thread.title: Listen to Terror Jr’s New Song With Lil B and Father
thread.title_full: Listen to Terror Jr’s New Song With Lil B and Father

author: Matthew Strauss
title: Listen to Terror Jr’s New Song With Lil B and Father
text:
11 hrs ago Listen to Terror Jr’s New Song With Lil B and Father The pop trio consists of Felix Snow, Campa, and a mysterious singer named Lisa—rumored to be Kylie Jenner 
Terror Jr are the pop trio of Felix Snow , Campa (of the Cataracs), and a mysterious singer named Lisa . Their debut project, Bop City , came out last October. Included on it was a song called “3 Strikes,” which was featured in Kylie Jenner’s “ Glosses ” video, leading many to speculate that Kylie Jenner is, in fact, the enigmatic Lisa. 
On Valentine’s Day, the group will release a new remix package of Bop City ’s “Come First,” including new mixes by Ryan Riback and Kid Froopy. Today, they’ve shared Felix Snow’s “Based Mix” of the track. It features Father and Lil B . Hear it below. Scroll down for the artwork. 
Watch Lil B perform “I’m God” at Pitchfork Music Festival 2013: 
Watch Father’s “Who’s Gonna Get Fucked First?” video, via Pitchfork.tv: Artists In This Story
